mapper.sql: t.id AS "id", t.parent_id AS "ParentId", t.node_id AS "NodeId", t.name AS "Name", t.key AS "Key", t.md5 AS "Md5", t.type AS "Type", t.logs AS "Logs", t.sort as "Sort", t.description AS "Description"

t.delete_flag = 0
and ( `name` like %keyword% or description like %keyword% or parent_id > -1 )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recharge_sys_mode ( parent_id, node_id, `name`, `key`, md5, `type`, logs, sort, description ) VALUES ( #{ParentId}, #{NodeId}, #{Name}, #{Key}, #{Md5}, #{Type}, #{Logs}, #{Sort}, #{Description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT FROM recharge_sys_mode t WHERE ORDER BY id desc LIMIT #{start}, #{length}
SELECT FROM recharge_sys_mode t WHERE ORDER BY type,sort,id
mapper.delete: UPDATE recharge_sys_mode set delete_flag = 1 where id = #{id}
UPDATE recharge_sys_mode set delete_flag = 1 where parent_id = #{parentId}
